newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Morrison Health upped to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Morrison Health upped to buy.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said it upgraded Morrison Health Care Inc to a buy from a neutral rating.
-- said upgrade based on company's more effective selling to new accounts from its realigned sales force.
-- said expects 15 to 20 percent total return over the next year, reflecting the high current yield and 10 to 15 percent earnngs per share growth.
-- lowered May 1998 fiscal year earnings estimate to $0.95 a share from $0.98 to reflect pricing pressure within the health care market.
